LanguageData.FALCLF.UseLightTextDesc: Use white instead of black text
LanguageData.FALCLF.ShowZoneLabelsDesc: Show stockpile and growing zone names on floor
LanguageData.FALCLF.MaxFontScaleDesc: Decimal value limiting the maximum size of text. At 1.0 a letter is about one tile wide. Must be between 0.1 and 5.0.
LanguageData.FALCLF.MinFontScaleDesc: Decimal value limiting the minimum size of text. A label needing text smaller than this will not be displayed. At 1.0 a letter is about one tile wide. Must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
LanguageData.FALCLF.MaxAllowedZoomDesc: Furthest zoom at which visible labels will be drawn. Note that very small labels may not be drawn at some zoom levels, regardless of this setting.
